column4: can anyone give me a hand with nm-applet? I ran: /etc/dbus-1/event.d/25NetworkManager stop and now I can't get it back. I've tried /etc/init.d/networking restart, I've tried running it from the terminal and ALT+F2 and it runs in my processes, but doesn't appear on the task bar
try this: sudo killall -9 nm-applet && nm-applet
it does the same thing it does every time I try to run nm-applet, it just sits on a blank line and does nothing
